Browser Support

Version 3.x supports all evergreen browsers. For IE support you can conditionally load the fallback grid. The fallback grid reverts to float based layout for older browsers that do not support CSS Grid. The fallback does not replicate all features of Blueprint but allows basic layout for legacy browsers

The fallback grid can be found in the installed package under /fallback/blueprint.min.css. You can conditionally load the fallback grid with the following JavaScript snippet.
